dict.string: DaisyDos needs access to your calendar to show your events alongside tasks and habits for better daily planning.
DaisyDos needs access to your reminders to integrate them with your tasks and habits for complete productivity management.
DaisyDos needs access to your photo library to allow you to attach photos to your tasks and habits.
DaisyDos needs permission to send notifications to remind you about upcoming tasks and habit completions.
